statements: SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_id = 1;
SELECT appointment_id, client_id, session_date FROM appointments WHERE appointment_id > 5;
SELECT client_id, session_date, session_time FROM appointments WHERE reminder_sent = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT client_id, session_date, session_time FROM appointments WHERE session_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY session_date DESC, session_time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT appointment_id, client_id FROM appointments WHERE reminder_sent = true
SELECT appointment_id, client_id, session_date FROM appointments WHERE session_time > '09:00:00' AND session_time < '13:00:00'
SELECT appointment_id, client_id, reminder_sent FROM appointments WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM appointments ORDER BY client_id ASC, session_date DESC
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name, email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE status = 'scheduled';
SELECT client_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE client_id = 2 ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, email FROM clients WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT client_id, client_name, email, phone_number FROM clients WHERE client_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT client_name, email, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM clients JOIN appointments ON clients.client_id = appointments.client_id WHERE appointments.status = 'scheduled';
SELECT client_id, client_name, email, appointment_date, appointment_time, status FROM clients JOIN appointments ON clients.client_id = appointments.client_id WHERE appointment_date < CURDATE();
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT full_name, email FROM clients ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, phone_number FROM clients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE status != 'Completed' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_type FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, full_name, email FROM clients WHERE email LIKE 'john.doe%';
SELECT COUNT(client_id) AS total_clients FROM clients WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT a.appointment_id, a.appointment_date, c.full_name, s.session_date FROM appointments a JOIN clients c ON a.client_id = c.client_id JOIN sessions s ON a.appointment_id = s.appointment_id;

SELECT c.full_name, a.appointment_type, s.session_notes FROM clients c LEFT JOIN appointments a ON c.client_id = a.client_id LEFT JOIN sessions s ON a.appointment_id = s.appointment_id WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT name, email FROM clients WHERE id = 1;
SELECT appointment_date, start_time, end_time FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT id, session_date, session_time, session_type FROM sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
SELECT reminder_date, reminder_time, message FROM reminders WHERE appointment_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, name, email FROM clients WHERE id > 5 AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT appointment_date, start_time, end_time FROM appointments WHERE status = 'Scheduled';

SELECT clients.name, appointments.appointment_date, sessions.session_type FROM clients INNER JOIN appointments ON clients.id = appointments.client_id INNER JOIN sessions ON appointments.id = sessions.appointment_id;
SELECT MAX(appointment_date), MIN(appointment_date) FROM appointments;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_phone FROM clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments ORDER BY appointment_date ASC, appointment_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_name, client_email FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM clients JOIN appointments ON clients.client_id = appointments.client_id;

SELECT clients.client_name, appointments.appointment_date, reminders.reminder_date FROM clients JOIN appointments ON clients.client_id = appointments.client_id JOIN client_reminders ON clients.client_id = client_reminders.client_id JOIN reminders ON client_reminders.reminder_id = reminders.reminder_id;

SELECT client_name, appointment_date, reminder_date FROM clients JOIN appointments ON clients.client_id = appointments.client_id JOIN sessions ON appointments.appointment_id = sessions.appointment_id JOIN client_reminders ON clients.client_id = client_reminders.client_id JOIN reminders ON client_reminders.reminder_id = reminders.reminder_id WHERE client_name LIKE '%John%';
